name: Theurgy Architect
description: Are you ready to wield the power of creation? In Theurgy City, you are the divine architect. With just a touch, reshape the land and watch as your intelligent citizens build a thriving metropolis around your will.

name: Wrap House Simulator
description: Welcome to Wrap House Simulator! Run your own wrap shop, chop, grill, and serve in this cooking adventure. Customize your shop, master the grill, and survive the rush solo or co-op with up to 4 players. Keep up with orders, satisfy customers, and build your dream restaurant!

name: Dragon Attack Mythologies: A Night Wolf Revenge
Home Again
description: Home Again is an interactive story game about Jason, a man stuck in an endless loop of work who adopts a stray cat. Discover Jason's journey through the eyes of his little cat friend as they meet Melissa, a caring florist who will change the way Jason sees the life.

name: Cralon
description: Cralon is an authentic 3D dungeon crawler with RPG and adventure elements, inspired by the ultimate dungeon classics. Hunting a demon, you fell into the abyss of an old mine. Equip yourself, fight creatures, solve quests, uncover secrets and find a way out.

name: Harold Rabbit: Finder of Lost Things
Omelet You Cook
description: The omelet-cooking roguelike. Assemble omelets for quirky customers using ingredients from a conveyor belt. Discover insane ingredient combinations to fulfill an ever-increasing score threshold. Overcome the hazards and restrictions of each customer and unlock new ingredients to use on future runs!

name: Muse
description: A narrative-driven visual novel where you help Clara, a struggling artist, overcome her creative block through painting mini-games and emotional choices in a surreal dream world.

name: Sunset Town
description: Explore a post-apocalyptic city destroyed by a solar flare. Fight mutated creatures, hostile factions, and harsh environments while scavenging for resources. Manage survival needs, upgrade gear, and uncover the truth behind the disaster in this challenging, randomly generated adventure.

name: Hang up Street
description: Build your vocational academy to turn adventurers into your idle heroes, liven up the deserted streets, and advance the levels together!

name: Chip ‘n Clawz vs. The Brainioids
description: An action-strategy game where you gather Brainium, build a base, and command your army of bots to defeat the freaky Brains-in-Jars aliens. Lead from the front with your hero, Chip or Clawz, or both in co-op. Look out for ejected alien brains, you can squish ‘em!

name: Parking Master
description: Parking Master is the ultimate parking simulation! Park with precision using real mirrors and advanced car systems. Navigate tight spots, manage your own parking empire across Europe and Japan. Build, expand, and conquer diverse environments!

name: Train Metropolis
description: Idle Clicker City Builder. Build and manage your railway company, helping the city expand and thrive as you grow together.

name: The Brothers Hotel
description: Welcome to The Brothers Hotel, where shadows whisper secrets, and every corner hides untold horrors. This spine-chilling indie horror game takes you deep into a mysterious hotel filled with eerie atmospheres, enigmatic puzzles, and a story that unveils the dark bond of two brothers.

name: The Suspense
description: How might life inside Artificial Intelligence be like? Is it possible to stop this painful routine? This life even real or not? Try your luck...

name: 3D Escape Room: Detective Story
description: 3D Escape Room: Detective Story is an immersive 3D puzzle game that takes you to 1930s London. In the game, you play as an insightful private detective, searching for clues in realistic 3D environments, solving intricate puzzles and mini-games, and cracking bizarre cases.

name: Spamware
description: You are sentenced to 3000 hours in prison. Earn your freedom by identifying and reporting spam.

name: Cave Path
description: Mine for valuable ores in a dangerous cave. Gather resources, fight monsters, and invest your earnings in skill upgrades as you push deeper for bigger rewards

name: Startron
description: Startron is an ASCII-based space colony sim where you can mine, harvest, build and automate your way across a procedurally generated cosmos. Lead a crew of sentient cats (or dogs) as they take their first steps out and discover the mysteries of the cosmos.

name: It Was You
description: A multiplayer murder mystery party for up to 12 players. Assume the role of Detective or Killer and use tools to uncover—or manipulate—evidence. Murder, investigate, discuss and deceive. Put your true-crime-solving skills to the test, or see if you are capable of cold-blooded murder.

name: Escape the Quack
description: Get ready to race in this exciting platformer against the clock, complete your tasks, and outsmart the duck in this captivating low-poly world! Compete against friends and the world with an online leaderboard.

name: Fire Hero: Pixel Rescue
description: Fire Hero - Pixel Rescue is a 2D pixel art platformer where you play as a firefighter rescuing civilians and animals from burning buildings. You'll travel through different worlds and biomes, following a story with short dialogues that reveal the dramatic events your character is experiencing.

name: Frontline Fury: Trenches, Mud & Blood
description: Enter the brutal battlefields of World War II in this grim, blood-soaked top-down shooter. Fight your way through relentless enemies with brutal gunplay, gritty visuals, and intense, unforgiving combat. Every bullet counts as you move through the trenches, leaving a trail of destruction and gore.

name: Blackshard
description: Blackshard is a first-person exploration game. Wander through a strange megastructure, the Labyrinth, to unravel its mysteries... Your behavior within the Labyrinth will define the outcome of your journey. What path will you choose to take?

name: Fear FA 98
description: FEAR FA 98: Silent Hill mixed with FIFA 98. Use your enemies' heads as the ball, use knives, and summon demons! the very first survival horror soccer simulator!. Play against the computer, or the classic local mode to enjoy with your friends on a terrifying afternoon worthy of the '90s.

name: Beyond the Map
description: Survival ARPG set in a procedurally-generated fantasy world. Build your base, craft powerful armor, and embark on a journey to uncover ancient secrets of this mysterious realm.

name: Golf Gambit
description: Mini-golf with traps, tricks, and tornados! Deploy your traps to mess with your opponents or find a new path to a hole-in-one! Golf Gambit is a fun and frantic mini-golf party game for up to 8 players.

name: Demon Inc.
description:
Demon Inc. is a strategic deck-building game where players take on the role of a demon CEO, trying to dominate the business world by taking down their competitors. Assemble powerful card combinations, expand your influence across diverse biomes, and make calculated decisions to grow your empire.

Featuring a dynamic mix of resource management, tactical card play, and evolving abilities, Demon Inc. challenges players to harness the power of demonic contracts and outmaneuver rival entities.

name: Recharge
description: Recharge is an RC car racing game built with Unreal Engine and ray tracing, offering realistic graphics. Designed for both RC enthusiasts and casual players, it combines thrilling races, deep customization, and diverse game modes—blending precision with excitement for a dynamic racing.

name: Rocket Squad: Infinity
description:
Rocket Squad is a team-based first-person shooter.
Infiltrate perilous planets, gather resources, and return safely to your shelter.
Utilize each character's unique abilities and strategically form your team to restore order to the universe.

name: Sonic The Hedgehog 2: Archives
description: “Sonic The Hedgehog 2: Archives” is ‘another beta hack’ that seeks to bring back cut content from the game's Prototypes, revitalize the game's concept and release levels and badniks, and fully recreate the early concept of the time-travel story. Along with this hack improves both the prototype content and the final content by adding new animations, badnik and character shots, level art and backgrounds, new music, and more.

name: Loom Path
description: Loom Path is a challenging 2D platformer that tests your reflexes and wits. With hundreds of levels, precision-based obstacles, and fair traps, every failure pushes you to improve. It’s a game that rewards patience with deep satisfaction. Do you have what it takes to reach the end?

name: Moai Alley
description: MoaiAlley is a mobile-friendly puzzle game that takes you to the Easter Island, where you help the Rapa Nui carve and transport the iconic Moai statues. You need to carve rocks, build roads, cut trees, and properly envision a way for the statues to be walked to their pedestals with the least moves possible.

name: Evolution Adventure
description: "Evolution Adventure" is an adventure game with elements of deck-building, idle mechanics, and the creation of your own unique monsters. Discover unique combinations and crossbreed creatures in the evolution chamber. Unravel all the mysteries and find all the monsters.

name: Among Us 3D
description: Teamwork and betrayal in space… now in 3D! In this party game, Crewmates work together to complete tasks before one or more Impostors kill everyone aboard. Experience all of the same deception and deceit as the original Among Us in all three dimensions.

name: Horny Kingdom: Cum Delivery
description: Horny Kingdom is a visual novel with tower defense elements. Free your kingdom from goblin armies, save the most beautiful princesses and they won't remain in your debt, helping you not only in battle but also bringing the lewdest fantasies to life!

name: Sunken Veins
description: Sunken Veins is a resource management horror game where you mine for coal and survive against monsters in an underwater coal mine. Keep the furnace powered, drain away water and repair leaks within the facility to complete your shift on time.

name: Ocean Survivors
description: Rule the high seas in intense naval combat! Dodge cannonballs, sink enemy ships, and loot their wrecks to upgrade your vessel. Steer the ultimate pirate ship and dominate the ocean!

name: Friendship with Benefits 2
description: Arcadia has changed, but its gorgeous ponies haven’t. In this eroge, explore a new world, unlock over 40+ explicit scenes, and romance 25+ unique girls—all eager to share their deepest desires with you. Where will you begin in this new world?

name: Sonic Boom and the Smash Crew
Dreadzone
description: Dreadzone is a survival game set in a deadly quarantine zone. Scavenge for resources, craft tools, build shelter, and survive against dangerous animals, zombies, mutants, and other survivors. Explore the zone where desperation drives everyone to do whatever it takes to survive.

name: Boring
description: The game about doing boring things

name: PedalVerse
description: PedalVerse combines the thrill of downhill MTB racing with the freedom of FPV drone exploration. Customize your rider and bike, race dynamic tracks, and set records to climb the leaderboard. Tackle challenges and explore a semi-open world. Ready to take on the challenge?

name: Microvania
description: Explore a tiny world, find upgrades, discover hidden paths, battle bosses in this retro-style metroidvania action platformer.

name: Bloodkill: Goreblast Overkill
description: BRUTAL First Person Shooter, explore the world to become stronger to achieve the main goal - kill the boss.

name: Star Trek​ x World of Warships: Commander Spock
Star Trek​ x World of Warships: Commander Sela
Star Trek​ x World of Warships: Commander Jean-Luc Picard
​​Star Trek​ x World of Warships: Commander Gowron
Nonozle: Food and Drink + Miscellaneous Puzzle Packs
Black Hole Void: Survive The Hole
Sushi Race: More Toppings Race Pack
Phi
description:
Phi is a 3D puzzle platformer that takes you on an emotional journey through four levels, each reflecting a key life experience—Happiness, Sadness, Fear, and Anger.
The game is in the prototype stage.

With over 25 unique puzzles, 12+ immersive events, and dynamic NPC interactions, the game blends exploration, storytelling, and platforming into a 4-8 hour experience.

Perfect for fans of Little Nightmares, Inside, Limbo, and Bramble: The Mountain King.

name: Sonic the Hedgehog Game Gear/Master System Remake
Plant Nursery Simulator
description: Plant Nursery Simulator is a cozy management simulation game where you run your own plant shop. Stock shelves with a variety of plants, order supplies, hire and manage staff, and expand your nursery to attract more customers. Grow and nurture plants to keep your store thriving while balancing costs and profits. With stylized visuals and a relaxing atmosphere, the game offers a wholesome experience for players who enjoy strategic planning and creative shop management.

name: Shotgun Cop Man
description: GO TO HELL, ARREST SATAN. Propel yourself to justice and glory on a journey through hell in this punchy, crunchy, son-of-a-gun precision platformer from the creator of My Friend Pedro.

name: Tactics Unlimited
description:
Tactics Unlimited innovatively combines elements of traditional sports management games, role-playing games (RPGs), and turn-based tactics, creating a deeply immersive experience that balances strategy, management, and action on the pitch.

It is a modern 3D football game that brings fresh energy to the genre by combining strategy, management, and on-field action into an immersive experience. With its realistic graphics, players are treated to lifelike depictions of stadiums, players, and in-game dynamics.

name: Shadows Fall
description: Set over 6 Zones of 3 Acts, Shadows Fall will tell a story, in the same vein as Sonic Rush and Chronicles, and power up Shadow with various upgrades along the way. Shadow is the only playable character planned right now, but he will be able to interact with several new characters, as well as a couple familiar ones...

name: Survival Adventures Collection
description: Are you ready for a survival adventure of your lifetime?

name: Crystal Fortress
description: Defend the Crystal Fortress and its people from invading forces in this blend of Turn-Based Tactical RPGs and Tower Defense. Summon the infantry, call out the archers, deploy turrets. Use all the available tools to keep the enemies at bay!

name: Emptiness Sire
description: Emptiness Sire is a turn-based puzzle adventure set in a world reborn in medieval times after a catastrophic meteor shower. Explore the ruins of humanity, face deadly cosmic horror creatures, and uncover secrets as you guide three heroes on a quest to survive the divine punishment.

name: Dinofurie
description: Dinofurie is a thrilling multiplayer battle royale where dinosaurs clash in intense survival battles. Choose from a diverse roster of prehistoric creatures, each with unique abilities and playstyles, and fight for dominance in a vast, dynamic world.

name: Confinement
description: Run for your freedom in an oppressive, cloistered space full of traps and challenges. Confinement is a game focused on agile movement and the Dash ability is set in a brutalist architectural environment, the game offers a challenging experience where the player must escape as quickly as possible.

name: A Tale In The Garden
description: A Tale in the Garden is a relaxing gardening simulator where you follow Filomena's journey. As she nurtures her garden for a contest, she eagerly awaits the arrival of her granddaughter Frida.

name: Wizard's Warp
description: Always wanted to learn how to teleport? Try not to get stuck in a wall! Wizard's Warp, a platformer that challenges those who are not afraid of hard challenges. Get to the top to save your favorite cat! But if you fall down, be ready for a rough landing.

name: Bomb Around
description:
... and find out!
Physics based rage game inspired by jump king and other foddian games. Play as unique characters trying to reach as high as possible. Use interesting upgrades to reach new heights and discover the difficulty ahead. Compete on the leaderboards with speedrun, daily seed, or just casual play.

name: Samurai Pizza Cats: Blast from the Past!
description:
That’s right folks! After more then 30 years the Samurai Pizza Cats finally return! The Big Cheese has an evil Scheme up his sleeve and it’s up to you, the player to stop him from taking over Little Tokyo!

The show first aired in Japan on February 1, 1990. Kyatto Ninden Teyandee is a science-fiction, action-comedy animated show set in Edoropolis, a city inhabited by anthropomorphic robotic animals. The series gained international recognition in the early 1990s when it was localized as Samurai Pizza Cats and broadcast worldwide and has maintained a dedicated fanbase to this day.

The new game, Samurai Pizza Cats: Blast from the Past!, is being developed by Dutch studio BLAST ZERO (creative team behind Jitsu Squad) and will be globally distributed by Red Dunes Games from the United Arab Emirates. Designed as a 2D action RPG, the game allows players to seamlessly switch between members of the Pizza Cats, utilizing their unique abilities to solve puzzles and engage in thrilling battles within the world of Little Tokyo.

name: The Unholy Priest
description: Manage a haunted funeral service as a priest in a cursed forest. Bury or cremate the dead, perform exorcisms, fend off demonic possessions, and quiet restless souls. Survive terrifying encounters, maintain sanity, and experience the pinnacle of horror simulation in The Unholy Priest!

name: Exodus
description: Nintendo Switch exclusive! 4 Cyberfunks co-op play! Immersive SF battles with Ultra HD visuals! Breathtaking effects, weapon sounds captivate FPS experience!

name: Tiny Lands: Deluxe Edition
description: Relax and find the differences in beautiful 3D dioramas. With the Deluxe Edition, you can play all the new expansions for Tiny Lands.

name: Sherlock Purr Adventures
description: Be a cat detective and uncover hidden objects in this purrfect two-game bundle!

name: Puzzle Adventures: Farm Animals
description: Easy to use puzzles for toddlers and kids. Featuring funny and cute animal motifs with 30 unique puzzles. 100% frustration free and child-safe.

name: Slice & Dice: Pizza Shop Simulator
description: Manage the shop by day, serving customers and keeping everything afloat, by night fend off hordes of crazed lunatics and handle unexpected challenges that come with being a small business owner. Enjoy a mix of cooking simulations, tower defense, and multiplayer co-op in this unique pizza adventure.

name: Piece by Piece
description: Piece by Piece is a LITERAL puzzle platformer where each level is fragmented into puzzle piece-shaped fragments. Assemble and unassemble the pieces to guide your character to the doorway and reach the next level!

name: The Fat Cat Fest
description: Fat Cat Fest is a party game full of minigames and challenges, where funny cats will compete to see who is the fastest and most skillful eater.

name: Greenhouse
description: Explore the eerie galleries and botanical spaces of the Greenhouse. Piece together the mystery ahead of the big reveal. Interact with optical art, illusions and weather effects. Turn on entities if you dare.

name: Baptiste
description:
Submerge yourself in a first-hand experience that will make you feel each chill as if it were real. The line between the game and reality blurs further with each step you take.

Explore a mansion where horror awaits in every shadow. The masterful dubbing and sound track will drag you to the depths of a nightmare. Darkness will become your most feared enemy, putting your bravery to the test in each corner.

Play as Tom, a young man still suffering from the tragedy. After the loss of his father, he accompanies his mother Sara on what ought to be a new beginning. However, the ghosts of the past threaten to consume him. Can you keep control against the siege of his inner demons?

Disentangle the gruesome secrets that impregnate each floorboard and each crack on the walls. Each discovery will reveal a story of pain and horror that beggars belief.

Submerge yourself into a world where beauty and terror coexist in a macabre dance. The visual design will transport you to a kingdom where the grotesque is fascinating.

Each objective, each note and each whisper contribute towards weaving the plot. Your perseverance in the face of fear will be rewarded with chilling revelations that will keep you on edge until the very end.

name: Moves Of The Diamond Hand
description: Immerse yourself in a first-person urban RPG, powered by dice and intrigue. This demo is the start of a journey where you might even shape the fate of a city. Whatever it takes to get the gig, right?

name: Panic Delivery
description: A horror/comedy co-op game for 4 players: deliver packages in a dystopian world ruled by a ruthless and grotesque society of monsters! Failure is not an option: if the customers don’t kill you, the company will… and another expendable human will take your place.

name: Chat Ragdoll Racing
description: Chat Ragdoll Racing is fully physics-based ragdoll animated simulation game where Twitch Streamers can host games for their communities and have people race against each other in a wild physics-based world.

name: Dice People
description: Dice People is an incremental game about rolling dice, creating a mass of units, smashing enemies, and gathering resources to get upgrades in a big skilltree.

name: Cats 'n Blocks
description: Cats 'n Blocks is a chaotic action game where you control a cat that attacks enemies by picking up pieces of the ground. Raise your paws and prepare yourself to fight, mess around, explore and unlock hidden items in this fast-paced adventure.

name: Bobo and the Chest of Nightmares
description: Jump, glide, and outsmart traps in this whimsical 3D platformer! Smash, fend off mischievous spirits, grind rails, and solve puzzles as you uncover the secrets of the Nightmare Chest. Collect hidden treasures and restore joy to a world shrouded in darkness!

name: Cruzcredo: Become a Legend!
description: Rise from the grave and stumble though the streets of Casca Dura, a city buzzing with mysteries, wacky gossip and some good ol' chaos thanks to the "Cruzcredo Curse". Flying rats, a vengeful ghost bride and, oh boy, the skinwalkers... Save Casca Dura from it's doom and become a legend!

name: Broventure: The Wild Co-op
description: Broventure = Vampire Survival + Base building + Co-op. Band together with friends and obliterate hordes of grueling enemies, gather crucial resources, and transform your camp into a sanctuary of liberation.

name: Machick 2
description: The anti-magic toads are back, stronger than ever, and the magical chickens are unleashing ancient powers to fight them! With even more wands and powers to master, vanquish enemies, collect XP, and upgrade like never before in Machick 2! Get ready to out-magic the menace!

name: Vespera Bononia
description: Vespera Bononia is a fast-paced action-roguelite set in an ever-changing city. Fight as nightmares come to life and switch classes as a shifting soul. Master a mix of third-person shooter, magic and bullet hell to survive.

name: Counter-Strike Techno: Zombies
description:
Counter-Strike T:Z is primarily a mod/game using some original content from games such as "Counter-Strike", "Counter-Strike: Nexon",
"Counter-Strike 2"

The purpose of the development: In the future, use Ray Tracing and PhysX technologies to make the game more realistic.

The game includes such game modes as: PVP/PVE, DeathMatch, GunDeathMatch, Classic, Zombie Mode

name: Office Rivals
description: Office Rivals is a slice-of-life visual novel and a love story between two office-rivals-turned-lovers, inspired by wholesome doujinshi and webtoons!

name: Outspace
description: Web browser MMO game made by single person.

name: Breeze of Ashes
description: Command airships in a tactical RTS where choices shape your story. Manage resources, upgrade your fleet, and battle rival factions in a non-linear campaign. With rogue-lite replayability, multiplayer co-op, and skirmish modes, your journey evolves with every playthrough.

name: Immortum
description: This psychological horror unravels your mind aboard the Immortum, a decaying spaceship carrying an impossible truth. Every wrong step risks a game over, and every right one twists your truth. Survive as Romi, a mother desperate to find her dying child in a foreign reality.

name: Darkest Days
description: Action, Adventure, Massively Multiplayer, RPG, Free To Play

name: Defense of Fort Burton
description:
This is game made by Ledx. A small indie game developer.
This is a single player game where player can defend the Fort Burton againsts evil forces. This is side scrolling point of view and similar to the genre of tower defense where enemies come in series and player need to strategically defend the fort.

name: Sixtar Gate: Stargazer
description: Sixtar Gate: STARGAZER is the exciting spinoff to the beloved rhythm game Sixtar Gate: Startrail. Play reimagined band-style versions of original tracks, explore a new story in Adventure Mode, and enjoy intuitive 4-lane rhythm gameplay perfect for beginners and veterans alike.

name: The Willowmist Emporium of Antiques & Curiosities
description: A cozy narrative shop sim where you move to the sleepy town of Willowmist to run your aunt’s antique store. Meet 5 charming love interests and quirky locals—each with secrets to uncover—in a town where nothing is quite as it seems. Buy, sell, and haggle to keep the store afloat!

name: Metal Gear Solid: Fight of the Metal Gears
description: The legendary fanfiction written by squirrelking will be illustrated by brilliant graphics in widescreen 360p resolution and fully voiced cinematic sequences! Fight of the Metal Gears lets players be Jake Snake himself, the son of the legendary Solid Snake. After Solid Snake's tragic death, Jake receives an urgent call from Otacon who informs him of Metal Gears in Out Heaven. Jake Snake decides to continue his father's legacy of destroying Metal Gears and killing bad guys!

name: SEMP 64
description:
This is a super easy multiplayer platformer, or SEMP for short.
So it's a 3D platformer, with online multiplayer and it's super easy
(Disclaimer: it's actually super difficult and not super easy)

Climb to the very top of the super huge level.
Fall down and... well try again I guess. Maybe you where lucky and able to save yourself onto a near platform. Or you lost hours of progress, who knows what'll happen.

Play alone, join the global lobby or host your own 4 player lobby for your friends.
But let's be real, it's much more fun to see tons of players fall down... I mean climb up the world.

Already mastered the game? Well respect. But what now?
Hop into the level editor and build your own levels! Let's see if you can make players rage quit even faster than I could.

name: Castle V Castle
description: Castle V Castle is a stylish 1v1 card game inspired by browser classics like Castle Wars & Wordle. Grow your castle and reduce your opponent to rubble in a magic-fueled duel of wits and bricks. Earn rewards, unlock new modes, and complete randomized daily challenges to cement your winning streak!

name: Station Haven 3
description: You are the lucky winner of a Space Research program aboard Station Haven 3! Join the station and the crew to learn and explore the dark side of Mars!

name: Firefighters Together
description: Firefighters Together is a chaotic co-op action platformer where 1-4 players work together to rescue kittens from dangerous, fire-filled maps. Overcome challenging obstacles, extinguish flames, and save those kittens!

name: Spookytale
description: In SPOOKYTALE, you follow the story of the young, rebellious Max, who’s on a search for their lost sibling. Their next big lead: a mysterious grave-yard. Throughout their adventure, you’ll get to meet new friends, visit old enemies, survive deadly japes, attend fancy balls, and explore a brand new world on the surface.

name: Undertale: The Otherground
description: In this new part of Undertale's world, take control of the new protagonist Louis as he searches to learn the fate or whereabouts of someone he held dear. Alongside this, cave-dweller twin humans "Sunny" and Renée will be joining Louis on this journey.

name: Kabuto Park
description: Enjoy summer in Kabuto Park! Capture the cutest bugs, train them and win the Summer Beetle Battles Championship in this little bug collection game! Upgrade your equipment to find rarer, stronger and shinier beetles, butterflies, bees or dragonflies.

name: Moonlit Journey: The Age of Deth
description: An RPG based in Medieval times tasks a player with restoring Law and Chaos (The Gods of the Game). This game has an interactive questline , inventory and world map available to the player. This is a 2D pixelated RPG.

name: Roadkill Agora
description:
Go out into the city and find yourself. Converse with wayward spirits and the dead at dawn. Walk a mile over twisting streets and wander through the alleys and nooks of a dreaming world.

Explore a city as it shifts and moves over the course of several days.
Find your way into over a dozen unique interiors.
Collect the trinkets of the brooding streets and make yourself an identity.
Talk with several NPCs as they enter and leave the stage.
Discover the city's secrets, maybe even a secret ending if you can.
Sweet dreams.

name: Totally Defenceless
description: Totally Defenceless is a wave-based tower defence game. You will need to protect your energy cores from the invading alien bugs by strategically constructing a maze of towers to alter their path to your advantage.

name: Undertale: Hard Mode - Wonderful Idea [Genocide Ending]
description: In Wonderful Idea, the personalities of certain characters are amplified. For example, Toriel is more protective, Undyne is more determined and Papyrus even ends up joining the Royal Guard.

name: A Solution
description: A prime minister is murdered, and the entire nation is in shock. No one had believed that something like this could happen here. Yet, everyday life continues, in the firm belief that the police are doing their utmost to find a solution. And they are—but the solution they are seeking is not the same one the people are looking for.

name: Bonehammer
description: A wargame system for Twitch's IRC. Allows deathmatches / team deathmatches with chat commands.

name: Neofall
description: Neofall is a RPG-PLATFORMER combo. You make friends, solve puzzles, beat bosses, and overcome your inner demons.

name: Project Reality
description: A fangame that uses the same roles as Storyshift, but uses them in a very different way. Project Reality will contain the same original characters you love, and some new ones as well...

name: The Legend of Ezra Raymond Squirrel
Sensational Studios: Underswap
description: Take on the role of a small human, as you explore an all new dynamic reimaging of the hit classic game UNDERTALE. Continue to decide the fate of monster kind's perception of humanity when faced with new unique surprises, and challenging obstacles. All in a world where no one has to die, again!

name: Lemon Sans: The Sensational Experiance
description:
In a game where anything can exist...
LEMON SANS CHOOSES TO NOT.

name: Diesel Knights
description: Diesel Knights is a 6-v-6, Mech/Movement Shooter set in a pulp-inspired, dieselpunk world.

name: Sonic Genesis of the Azure Wind
Driveloop
description: Driveloop is a fast-paced driving roguelike shooter. Drift, blast and ram your way through waves of steampunk enemies. Upgrade your vehicle with powerful weapons, recruit unique crew members and survive intense battles as you build the ultimate combat machine. Can you survive the chaos?

name: Sonic Genesis of the Azure Wind
Madness Interactive Reloaded
description: A simulator fan-made remake of 2003 madness interactive, with ragdolls, custom levels and guns
